paragraph.heading: 2Unix/Linux Users:
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio supports `gcc' on most platforms and the native`cc' compiler if it is an ANSI C compiler.
paragraph.heading: 2Microsoft Visual C++ Users
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio supports only version 6.0 and higher of the Microsoft Visual C++ environment. You can still use older versions of the Microsoft C++ environment (version 4.1, 4.2 or 5.0) as long as you have the latest Platform SDK from Microsoft, but this won't be supported by Eiffel Software.

Normally it will automatically detect the location of the C compiler. In case it wouldn't, make sure that the Microsoft tools are correctly setup to run from the MS-DOS prompt. To do that you need to set the environment variable PATH, LIB and INCLUDE to the value specified in the file`vcvars32.bat' from the `bin' directory of the VC installation.
paragraph.heading: 2Borland C++ Users:
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio only supports version 5.5.1 of Borland C++ which is included in the installation of EiffelStudio. We do not support any other versions.
By default the installation program will set in the registry keys the ISE_C_COMPILER key to `bcb'.
